Html: Hi I am in a fix... The client has asked for a radar chart in php excel but i cant figure out a way to make it... I can see examples of bar chart,pie chart etc but not radar chart.. Would be great if someone could put up an example of that too...There is no documentation on charts too , so I just cant seem to figure out anything unlike the more intelligent guys out here....:-)
I've just added a radar chart example to the latest github develop branch (33chartcreate-radar.php) though you'll need to pull the latest develop branch with a fix for the X-Axis labels
